results.definition: an agreement between parties (usually arrived at after discussion) fixing obligations of each
examples: he made a bargain with the devil
he rose to prominence through a series of shady deals
she got a bargain at the auction
the stock was a real buy at that price

results.definition: negotiate the terms of an exchange
examples: We bargained for a beautiful rug in the bazaar

results.definition: come to terms; arrive at an agreement
